signupContent.title: FR-Get an Instant Quote and Purchase Coverage

form.checkbox1Label: FR-I understand and agree to the use of application agreement.
form.checkbox2Label: FR-I understand and agree the information submitted will be used in line with our privacy policy.

errors.passwordMinCharacters: FR-Password must be a minimum of 8 characters
errors.passwordMinSpecialCharacter: FR-Password should contain at least one special character from ^$*.[]{}()?-+_|'<>,"!@#%&\/
errors.passwordUppercaseCharacters: FR-Password must contain at least 1 uppercase alphabet
errors.passwordLowerCharacters: FR-Password must contain at least 1 lowercase alphabet
errors.passwordNumericCharacters: FR-Password must contain at least 1 numeric character
errors.phoneNumberMinLength: FR-Phone number must be 10 digits long.
